about_the_game:
‘Intimate Relationship’ is an interactive novel game, also called AVG game, with multiple endings depending on different decisions.
Players need to make various decision during the story.


The male protagonist played by the player shares an apartment with Yukie for several years.
You live on a monotonous life with a 9-to-5 job.
The only fun thing is to occasionally pretend to be a couple to enjoy the deals and activities that various stores have launched for couples.


One day, you saw a couple activities in a nearby theme park on TV, and you invited Yukie, who had just returned from a business trip, to play together. Yukie agreed immediately.


In the theme park, there are different choices to choose from which will affect your relationship.

Now, it depends on your decision whether you both keep as friends or go further.


Yukie: Roommate who have lived with you for many years;
Pretend to be a couple with you many times.



Multiple endings make every decision count.
Exquisite game CG and soundtrack make game play more comfortable.
Support multi-language

Operations:
Left mouse button to confirm
[enter] Confirm
[Esc] Open the menu
Right mouse button to open the menu

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 135 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: You and Yukie have been roommates for many years. Although you have pretended as a couple many times for various reason. You think that are you are just only good friends.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
